divs: Sighting DetailsStill shook up thinking about it!!!! Here is my girlfriend and I personal experience...... We have been watchin tha skies alot lately.... Alot of weird lights in sky. Anyway on this particular night I was outside smoking. My gf was in r apt and I called her on her cell 2 tell her to check out this bright red pulsating lights.... I felt likw someone was listening to our phone call.... Very creepy :( she came outside n tha thing disappeared. We were talking and next thing we kno she tells me to look up and this triangle object steel grey looking no,lights or sound is hovering and headed towards us!!!!! It hov erred over our heads we ran inside because we were scared to death!!!! I have a very uneasy feeling about it and im scared. We told a few people but they think were crazy. It was too close n I feel like something isnt right :(
Summary: I feel like they can hear us and our thoughts......very unsettling!!!!!
